thread.title: Boys Basketball Reserved Seats on Sale
thread.title_full: Boys Basketball Reserved Seats on Sale

author: N.C.H.S. Athletic Director Doug Mammoser
title: Boys Basketball Reserved Seats on Sale
text: Boys Basketball Reserved Seats on Sale Comment By N.C.H.S. Athletic Director Doug Mammoser   N.C.H.S. Athletic Director Doug Mammoser Posted Oct. 23, 2015 at 9:55 AM By N.C.H.S. Athletic Director Doug Mammoser Posted Oct. 23, 2015 at 9:55 AM Newton, IL The 2015-2016 N.C.H.S. boys basketball reserved seats will go on sale on Monday, November 2, 2015, for fans with reserved seats from last season. General public sales of the reserved seats will be Monday, November 9. Price per reserved seat is $40 each. The reserved seat ticket is good for the regular home season games only, but not for any tournament games that might be played at N.C.H.S. A family pass is $125 and entitles you to two (2) reserved chair seats. If you want additional reserved seats, the cost will be $15 per chair. Please call Diane Farley at N.C.H.S. 618-783-2303. The Eagles open their 2015-2016 season on Friday, December 4, 2015. By N.C.H.S. Athletic Director Doug Mammoser   N.C.H.S. Athletic Director Doug Mammoser Posted Oct. 23, 2015 at 9:55 AM
